CFFI User Manual

last updated april 12, 2013

This document is available in the following formats:

  • HTML (396K characters) - entirely on one web page.
  • HTML - with one web page per node.
  • HTML compressed (72K gzipped characters) - entirely on one web page.
  • HTML compressed (100K gzipped tar file) - with one web page per node.
  • Info document (56K characters gzipped tar file).
  • ASCII text (176K characters).
  • ASCII text compressed (48K gzipped characters).
  • TeX dvi file (84K characters gzipped).
  • PostScript file (252K characters gzipped).
  • PDF file (512K characters).
  • Texinfo source (60K characters gzipped tar file)
